title: Herbs and Essential Oils
description: We craft our herbal self care products with high quality organic or wild harvested ingredients. Each product is handmade in small batches with carefully curated recipes. Many of our recipes are derived from Appalachian and Amish methods. Love Calhoun Farm apothecary and natural herbal products? Join our Monthly Sub
cleaned_text: Herbs and Essential Oils We craft our herbal self care products with high quality organic or wild harvested ingredients. Each product is handmade in small batches with carefully curated recipes. Many of our recipes are derived from Appalachian and Amish methods. Love Calhoun Farm apothecary and natural herbal products? Join our Monthly Subscription boxes and have them delivered every month! Check them out here- [Subscription Boxes (Monthly) - Calhoun Farm (calhounfarmstead.com)](https://calhounfarmstead.com/collections/subscription-boxes-monthly) These recipes have not be tested or approved by the FDA.
